channel.title: Help [NOT SOLVED YET] -.- 14 answers and not solved
channel.description:
Yo guys, im making a server, is online atm! u can find in google the name is PlatinumPK
i have some problems, here i go:
1 - How i change the respawining zone (when u die u go to the respawning zone)?
2 - Players dont lose stuff when they die... I wanna change that!
3 - I wanna add cash spawning like (u do ::item 4151 1, and u lose 1.5m (whip) and u get the whip) how i do that??
PLEASE HELP ME MY SERVER MUST BE DONE QUICKLY!

item.title: Help [NOT SOLVED YET] -.- 14 answers and not solved
item.dc:creator: @k0isk0 k0isk0
item.description:
@k0isk0 wrote:

For three easely copy a shop code.

It goes buy a item for 5m 995, 5000000 and replace it with a whip orso.

You should find this urself.

Read full topic
item.source: Help [NOT SOLVED YET] -.- 14 answers and not solved

item.title: Help [NOT SOLVED YET] -.- 14 answers and not solved
item.dc:creator: @deans1243 deans1243
item.description:
@deans1243 wrote:

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase(“change”)) { //Starts the command
if (c.getItems().playerHas(995, 1500000)) { //Checks to see if the player has the items
try { //Attempts to perform the actions mentions below
c.getItems().deleteItem(995, 1500000); //Deletes the item to change (tokens)
c.getItems().addItem(4151, 1); //Adds the newer item (cash)
c.sendMessage(“you trade cash for a whip”); //Sends a message, if it works.
} catch(Exception e) { //Catches any errors in the command
System.out.println(c.playerName + " has received an errors whilst trying to do the ::change command."); //Informs the hoster that someone received an error
} //Closes the catch statement
} else { //If the player doesn’t have enough items, do the following
c.sendMessage(“not en ough cash sorry”); //Sends a message to inform the player that they don’t have enough of the item needed (token)
return; //Returns, so nothing else happens
} //Closes the check for having the items, and for not having the items
} //Closes the command

thats for a pi source it just gives you a general idea of how the command should look

Read full topic

item.title: Help [NOT SOLVED YET] -.- 14 answers and not solved
item.dc:creator: @agfy25 agfy25
item.description:
@agfy25 wrote:

Lol, I am not sure how hard changing a few variables is. It’s like they are giving you the pudding in the spoon but you can’t tell it where to go, in your ear or in your mouth. Your choice bud. ;D But I’ll explain.

if (command.startsWith("whipsell") && playerHasItem(4151)) { addItem(995, 1500000); deleteItem(4151, 1); }
playerHasItem(4151) = checks to see if you have the item to sell, replace the (4151) with the item ID you want to sell whipsell = the command you type in you can change it to what you want "::whipsell" 1500000 = is how much gold you get deleteItem(4151, 1) = change the (4151) to the item you want them to sell it is supposed to be like the first item ID

Read full topic

item.title: Help [NOT SOLVED YET] -.- 14 answers and not solved
item.dc:creator: @Nemesis_Ryan Nemesis_Ryan
item.description:
@Nemesis_Ryan wrote:

thats what i was saying you can do.

Basically make a command like
if (command.startsWith(“whipsell”) && playerHasItem(4151)) {
addItem(995, 1500000);
deleteItem(4151, 1);
}

That should remove the whip and add the money.
